description: Valuation spreadsheets from Damodaran Online used as reference data for DCF and DDM models

valuations.valuation_method: Gordon Growth Model (Stable Growth Dividend Discount Model)
valuations.model_description: Values equity in a stable firm paying dividends roughly equal to FCFE. Assumes firm is in steady state growing at a stable rate forever.

historical_comparison.description: Estimated value vs actual price over time

valuations.valuation_method: FCFF (Free Cash Flow to Firm) DCF - Multi-stage Model
valuations.model_description: Damodaran FCFF model for firms with positive/normalizable operating income. Supports 2-stage or 3-stage (with transition) growth. Values operating assets via WACC-discounted FCFFs plus terminal value.

valuations.valuation_method: FCFF (Free Cash Flow to Firm) DCF - Multi-stage Model
valuations.model_description: Damodaran FCFF model for firms with positive/normalizable operating income. Supports 2-stage or 3-stage (with transition) growth. Values operating assets via WACC-discounted FCFFs plus terminal value.
